description.oldValue:
Expand the functionality of DLP Policy Tips in
Outlook Win32 to support additional
top predicates and exceptions, and advanced classification for E5 users.
description.newValue: Expand the functionality of DLP Policy Tips in Outlook Win32 to support additional top predicates and exceptions, and advanced classification for E5 users. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
